title: Event Envelope v1
description: Standard envelope for all QTrader events - provides event metadata and tracing

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this event instance

event_type.description: Type of event - must match schema base name (e.g., 'bar', 'corporate_action')

occurred_at.description: UTC timestamp when event occurred (RFC3339 with Z suffix)

correlation_id.description: Links related events in a workflow/transaction

causation_id.description: ID of the event that directly caused this event
